Articles.Content:
ISO an SSTO that could take off from Eve and get to orbit 91K*91K+

Can use Interstellar-ext. and  FFT and Spitefire. If you need other mods name them.

Is this supposed to be a challenge? If it is, it is in the wrong place and needs more body. If it is a showcase, please post pictures or a download. Thank you.

Fire
